yeah, sorry. i didn't have time to write a big review, but its been on mind since i saw it. its haunting, dark & sinister, but yet the pace of the movie is relentless. you have no time to ponder what just happened or what you think might happen next because the movie doesn't allow you to. it move briskly from one scene to the next.

the musical score is down right eerie and unsettling at times. the sound effects are awesome (at least in the theater i saw it in). great cinematography too.

i have some nit-piks with it, but over all i'd give it a B+ or maybe an A-

post.body:
yeah, I thought it was great the darker super hero theme is definitely something new and it was nice to have a hero who could be more vengeful, act above the law to catch the criminals ( fight fire with fire ).
